front.title: PT-TLS: A Posture Transport (PT) Protocol Compatible with TNC Using Transport Layer Security (TLS)

abstract.t: This document specifies PT-TLS, a Posture Transport (PT) protocol identical to the Trusted Computing Group's IF-T Binding to TLS 1.0 protocol. The document then evaluates PT-TLS against the requirements defined in the NEA Overview and Requirements and PB-TNC specifications.
